name: Sahara AI
description: Sahara AI is the first full-stack, AI-native blockchain platform where anyone can create, contribute to, and monetize AI development, making the future of AI more accessible, equitable, and open to all. Built on the Sahara blockchain, Sahara AIâ€™s comprehensive platform consists of a Data Services Platform for data collection, labeling and refinement, an AI Developer Platform for model creation, deployment, and orchestration, and a decentralized AI Marketplace where you can buy and sell datasets, models, agents, and compute.
